body.p: The Synopsys GitHub Action leverages Synopsys Bridge, allowing you to configure your GitHub pipeline to run Synopsys security testing and take action on the results.
The latest version of Synopsys GitHub Action can be installed from the GitHub Marketplace link at: https://github.com/marketplace/actions/synopsys-action.

By configuring the above Synopsys Action entries in your workflow.yml file, security scanning tools automatically leverage Synopsys GitHub Actions (including all necessary files) and Synopsys Bridge to run pipeline scans on your GitHub repository.
Mask sensitive data like access tokens and URLs using GitHub secrets.
